episode.title: New York State Club Association Inc. v. City of New York

section.heading: Opinion Announcement of Byron R. White

turn.speaker: william_h_rehnquist
turn.label: Chief Justice William H. Rehnquist
turn.text: The opinion of the Court in No. 86-1836, New York State Club Association versus the City of New York will be announced by Justice White.

turn.speaker: byron_r_white
turn.label: Justice Byron R. White
turn.text: We have filed an opinion in this case affirming the judgment of the Court of Appeals of New York. Our judgment is unanimous.
Justice O'Connor has filed a concurring opinion and Justice Kennedy has joined that opinion.
Justice Scalia has filed an opinion concurring in part and concurring in the judgment.
